item.description:
Feb 3, Feb 10, and Feb 17 - 6:00 to 9:00 PM
Comfort Inn. 900 East Main Street, Meriden, CT
$140 for CT REIA members | $180 for Not-yet-members
Tuition includes a 81 page real estate investment course manual

Register For This Event at: www.ctreia.com/events.php

Learn the basics of investing in real estate: wholesaling, rehabbing, selling quickly, and holding for long-term income.

* Create a Lead Generation Machine
* Work with Realtors as Part of Your Buying and Selling Strategies
* Be Able to Find Great Investment Properties
* Inspect Properties With Confidence
* Evaluate Every Deal
* Make Offers with Confidence
* Learn How to Wholesale Properties
* Estimating and Manage Projects with Confidence
* Deal with Contractors
* Learn the Art of Retailing
* Learn the Keeper Business (AKA Landlording)
* Create a Sure Plan to Create Wealth

CT REIA is pleased to present New England's Number One Real Estate Investors workshop for new investors. This workshop is design to give new investors an opportunity to learn in detail the basis of getting started and to guide you through the investing process. If you are a new investor or simply new to the CT REIA association, please join us for this Newbie workshops.

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Workshop For New Real Estate Investors: Find It, Fix It, Flip It or Keep It
